item.description:
THE WEATHER IS VERY RAINY SO THIS EVENT IS CANCELED! SCHADE!!!!

Special Event! Eine neue Idee!
Come join your German-speaking friends for a potluck picnic, carillon concert and fireworks! Meet at 19:00 in the center of the Trinity quadrangle for picnic with German conversation. The quadrangle is a large, beautiful grassy lawn surrounded by old-English style buildings.It is a beautiful setting and the event is FREE. At 8:00 there will be a carillon concert coming from the chapel tower, and then at dark the Hartford fireworks display should be visible because we are up on a hill. Many people gather to watch the fireworks from there. This will be a combined event with the French Meetup. If you speak both languages, you will talk a lot!! Parking is free anywhere on campus and the surrounding streets.There will be a table with the usual flags etc.
Bring: some food/drink to share, a blanket or chair, and a spirit of fun! Please RSVP so we'll know to look for you.
Danke,
Dianne
item.name: CANCELLATION-Holiday picnic, concert,fireworks!
